items.sentence: They need the job to be done. It doesn't matter who does it.
The woman Tom is dating now is three years older than he is.
Our new neighbors aren't as noisy as our old neighbors were.
Tom can generally be relied on to make good on his promises.
Tom tried on the shoes that he found in the abandoned house.
Allow me to know in advance when you are coming up to Tokyo.
We heard a storm was headed our way, so we headed for shore.
The origin of the universe will probably never be explained.
When I look back upon those days, it all seems like a dream.
There are some things you can say and some things you can't.
